title: WGP - CS (1.5 / 1.6) movie

Comment:
No this is not the best CS movie you&#039;ll ever watch.
No it doesn&#039;t got plenty of special effects and cool visual stuff
because I made it on a PC where editing is really extreme 
thing to do.
No we are not professionals ( and we don&#039;t pretend to be)
No it&#039;s not CS:S movie but a CS 1.5/1.6 movie
No we are not using hacks (recorded with fraps, if we 
were using hacks they would show on the movie)
No I don&#039;t know what more No to say... So read below.


The 2 guys in the movie are Me and a friend of mine.
Me (SsS) is playing CS 1.6 and EaGlE is playing 1.5
in the movie. (We are better at 1.5 actually. :] )
We just thought we play good enough
to show our playstyle to other people and see
what they think about it. I hope you&#039;ll enjoy it.
And massage to all the noobies:
"Put your headgear on and make an imaginary
map of where your enemies are by just listening
to their steps and actions. Use your brain^^"
